response.job_title: Gender | Climate Change | Sustainable Mobility | Urban development | Public policy
response.summary:
I am passionate about the development of territories with a vision of equity, inclusion, and diversity.

I'm a Civil Engineering and MSc in Transport and Sustainable Development, and I am currently studying a master's degree in Gender Studies. I have experience in the public and private sector in projects related to climate change management and sustainable mobility. I coordinated from the public sector the National Strategy for Active Mobility with a gender and diversity approach (2022) and participated in the team for the definition of the Nationally Determined Contributions (NDC) for the transport sector from non-motorized transport and urban management actions. I have experience as a consultant in sustainable mobility projects integrating a gender and diversity approach. I am fluent in Spanish, French and English.
_
Je suis passionnée par le développement des territoires avec une vision d'équité, d'inclusion et de diversité.

J'ai étudié le génie civil et j'ai un master en Transport et Développement Durable et j'étudie actuellement un master en Études de Genre. J'ai de l'expérience dans le secteur public et privé dans des projets liés à la gestion du changement climatique et à la mobilité durable. J'ai coordonné depuis le secteur public la Stratégie Nationale pour la Mobilité Active avec une approche de genre et diversité (2022) et j'ai participé à l'équipe pour la définition des Contributions Déterminées au Niveau National (NDC) pour le secteur des transports à partir des actions de transport non motorisé et de gestion urbaine. J'ai de l'expérience en tant que consultante dans des projets de mobilité durable garantissant une approche de genre et différentielle. Je parle couramment l'espagnol, le français et l'anglais.
_
Apasionada por el desarrollo de los territorios con una visión de equidad, inclusión y diversidad.

Soy profesional en ingeniera civil con maestría en Transporte y Desarrollo Sostenible y estudios de maestría en Estudios de Género. Tengo experiencia en el sector público y privado en proyectos relacionados con la gestión del cambio climático desde la movilidad sostenible. Coordiné desde el sector público la Estrategia Nacional de Movilidad Activa con enfoque de género y diferencial (2022) y participé en el equipo para definición de las Contribuciones Nacionalmente Determinadas (NDC) para el sector transporte desde las acciones de transporte no motorizado y gestión urbana. Tengo experiencia como asesora en proyectos de movilidad sostenible garantizando el enfoque de género y diferencial. Hablo español, francés e inglés.

company.name: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
company.description:
As a service provider in the field of international cooperation for sustainable development and international education work, we are dedicated to shaping a future worth living around the world. GIZ has over 50 years of experience in a wide variety of areas, including economic development and employment promotion, energy and the environment, and peace and security. The diverse expertise of our federal enterprise is in demand around the globe – from the German Government, European Union institutions, the United Nations, the private sector and governments of other countries. We work with businesses, civil society actors and research institutions, fostering successful interaction between development policy and other policy fields and areas of activity. Our main commissioning party is the German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ).

The commissioning parties and cooperation partners all place their trust in GIZ, and we work with them to generate ideas for political, social and economic change, to develop these into concrete plans and to implement them. Since we are a public-benefit federal enterprise, German and European values are central to our work. Together with our partners in national governments worldwide and cooperation partners from the worlds of business, research and civil society, we work flexibly to deliver effective solutions that offer people better prospects and sustainably improve their living conditions.

The registered offices of GIZ are in Bonn and Eschborn (Germany).

Registration information: https://www.giz.de/en/html/registration_information.html

Our netiquette: https://www.giz.de/en/mediacenter/93951.html

Data privacy statement: https://www.giz.de/en/html/data_protection.html
